secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both fruits, but one must be a citrus fruit and the other must be a berry.

conversation.content:
To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "orange" and "strawberry  
lemon" and "blueberry".
The secret rule seems to be that you can bring items that are names of fruits. "Orange," "strawberry," "lemon," and "blueberry" are all examples of fruits.
